name: NCT Corporation
description:
Founded in 2008, NCT Corporation was originally named Nhaccuatui Corporation, according to our first product nhaccuatui.com, a music sharing website where people can share their favorite music to friends and others. Everyday, we welcome approximately 2 million unique visits to nhaccuatui.com and currently one of the top-in-mind brand of users.

In 2009, the company decided to expand business to e-commerce and nava.vn was born as the first professional B2C website in Vietnam. Nava.vn quickly becomes popular within internet community and promising to grow much further in the future.

In 2010, viss.vn, an online dating service was introduced and also quickly attracts internet fans.

2 years, 3 main products, triple digit growth, 35 employees...but it is definitely not the end.

Our Team

From a 2 people company in 2008, NCT has grown to a 35 people company by 2010. And by 2011, we expect to grow to a 100 employees company.

Young, fun, friendly, supportive, smart, hardworking...NCT's team is key to company's today success and we believe people will always be the key to success of any corporation.

Our Focus

In term of company strategy, we focus on our core business value and develop related products based on core value.

In term of people development, we target that each employee joins NCT will not only receive competitive financial benefit but also a clear career development.
